name: Captain Rohit Aviation Academy
about: Captain Rohit Aviation Academy, established in 2016, is a premier institution in Mumbai dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. We specialize in ground classes for students, who are then sent abroad for comprehensive flying courses. Our academy is renowned for its exceptional training programs, including Commercial Pilot Training and Air Hostess Training. With a strong focus on DGCA exam preparation, we ensure our students are well-equipped with the knowledge, skills, and confidence necessary for success in the aviation industry. Our experienced faculty, led by Rohit Sir, deliver clear, thorough, and engaging teachings. We are committed to excellence and passion for aviation, making us a top choice for both domestic and international students pursuing their aviation dreams.
services:
["Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL)
Airline Preparation
Type Rating
R.T.R (A)
Flight Simulator Training"]
